statements: SELECT * FROM assessment_data ORDER BY test_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT assessment_id, student_id, test_score FROM assessment_data WHERE student_id = 10
SELECT assignment_submission FROM assessment_data WHERE assessment_id = 100
SELECT student_id, test_score, feedback FROM assessment_data ORDER BY student_id
SELECT * FROM assessment_data WHERE assignment_submission IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM assessment_data WHERE test_score > 80 ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT student_id, test_score FROM assessment_data WHERE student_id = 1 AND test_score < 70
SELECT COUNT(assessment_id) AS total_assessments FROM assessment_data GROUP BY student_id HAVING student_id > 5
SELECT student_id, AVG(test_score) AS average_score FROM assessment_data GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY average_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT student_id, assignment_submission FROM assessment_data WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM Test_Scores WHERE score > 80;
SELECT test_name, score FROM Test_Scores WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT student_id, submission_date FROM Assignment_Submissions ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Assignment_Submissions WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT student_id, test_name, score FROM Test_Scores WHERE score < 60 ORDER BY score ASC;
SELECT student_id, test_name, score FROM Test_Scores WHERE test_name = 'Math' ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Assignment_Submissions WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY submission_date ASC;
SELECT student_id, assignment_name, submission_date, status FROM Assignment_Submissions WHERE status = 'submitted' ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id, COUNT(test_name) as tests_taken FROM Test_Scores GROUP BY student_id HAVING tests_taken > 2 ORDER BY student_id;

SELECT student_id, test_name, score FROM Test_Scores JOIN Assignment_Submissions ON Test_Scores.student_id = Assignment_Submissions.student_id WHERE Assignment_Submissions.status = 'submitted' ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT * FROM test_scores;
SELECT student_id, score FROM test_scores WHERE test_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE student_id = 100;
SELECT MAX(score) as highest_score FROM test_scores;
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) as avg_grade FROM assignment_submissions GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY avg_grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, test_id, score FROM test_scores WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT student_id, assignment_id, grade FROM assignment_submissions WHERE grade < 70 ORDER BY grade ASC
SELECT student_id, feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE student_id = 1001 ORDER BY feedback_id
SELECT test_id, student_id, score FROM test_scores WHERE student_id = 2002 ORDER BY test_id
SELECT assignment_id, submission_date, grade FROM assignment_submissions WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY submission_date
SELECT * FROM test_scores;
SELECT student_id, score FROM test_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT student_id, test_id, score FROM test_scores WHERE score > 80;
SELECT * FROM assignment_submissions ORDER BY student_id ASC, assignment_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, progress_id, progress_status FROM student_progress WHERE progress_status='completed';
SELECT * FROM test_scores WHERE student_id = 1 AND score > 80;
SELECT student_id, test_id, score FROM test_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT student_id, assignment_id, submission FROM assignment_submissions WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM test_scores;
SELECT student_id, feedback FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM test_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT student_id, test_id, score FROM test_scores WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT test_name, test_date FROM tests WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, student_id FROM students
SELECT test_name, test_date, test_id FROM tests
SELECT feedback_text, student_id, feedback_id FROM feedback
SELECT assignment_id, student_id, submission_time FROM assignment_submissions
SELECT test_id, student_id, score FROM test_scores
